events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but I want to return it because it doesn't fit well and I would like a refund.
The customer's issue has been categorized as a Refund request based on their reason for return.
The case has been assigned to Customer Service Agent Jessica Lee for handling the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I'm here to assist you with your return and refund.
Could you please confirm the order number and whether the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way?
The order number is 4578921. The jacket is brand new; I tried it on just once and thereâ€™s no damage.
We can initiate the refund process for you. Please use the return label we email shortly to ship the jacket back at no cost.
Thank you for the clear instructions and free return label; that sounds perfect. I will send it back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can help you with.
The case is now closed as your refund has been completed successfully. Thank you for choosing our service.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your satisfaction with the refund process. Your feedback is valuable to us.
